statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_performance FROM vendor_scorecard;
SELECT product_quality, communication_skills FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, on_time_delivery FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE product_quality > 8;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard ORDER BY communication_skills DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, product_quality FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE delivery_performance > 5;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, product_quality, communication_skills FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE on_time_delivery < 4;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scorecard WHERE product_quality > 7 AND delivery_performance < 5;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, (delivery_performance + product_quality) AS total_score FROM vendor_scorecard;
SELECT * FROM supplier_scores;
SELECT supplier_id, score FROM supplier_scores WHERE score > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email, phone_number FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_id = 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_details ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_scores JOIN supplier_details ON supplier_scores.supplier_id = supplier_details.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM supplier_details WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, score FROM supplier_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM supplier_details WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND supplier_name NOT LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating, product_name, product_category FROM vendors INNER JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id ORDER BY vendor_rating DESC, product_price ASC;
SELECT review_date, review_comment FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' AND review_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM product WHERE product_type='Electronics';
SELECT vendor_id, amount FROM purchase_order WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_id, rating FROM scorecard ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendor WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM product WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT vendor_name, rating FROM vendor INNER JOIN scorecard ON vendor.vendor_id = scorecard.vendor_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM vendor INNER JOIN purchase_order ON vendor.vendor_id = purchase_order.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM vendor_scores;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_score, quality_score FROM vendor_scores;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM purchase_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_score, quality_score FROM vendor_scores ORDER BY quality_score DESC, delivery_score ASC
SELECT * FROM purchase_orders JOIN products ON purchase_orders.vendor_id = products.vendor_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price, vendor_name FROM products JOIN vendor_scores ON products.vendor_id = vendor_scores.vendor_id WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE vendor_id = 3 ORDER BY contact_name

SELECT vendor_name, overall_rating, CAST(rating_date AS DATE) AS rating_date FROM supplier_ratings JOIN vendor_scores ON supplier_ratings.vendor_id = vendor_scores.vendor_id WHERE overall_rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating_date DESC
